Package com.api.hub.ai.handler

Interface InputOutputHandler

All Known Implementing Classes:
SimpleAgentInputOutputHandler
public interface InputOutputHandler
Interface representing the communication handler between an AI agent and the user in the AI-Agent Framework.

This interface defines a contract for handling input and output operations for agents. It is designed to allow agents to send responses to users, receive new inputs, and report success/failure status. It also gives agents access to the current EnvironmentState to aid in processing tasks in context.

Usage in Framework:

  • The Environment or agent implementation will inject an instance of this interface into the agent's State object before processing begins.
  • Agents can use this handler to:
  • Receive user input via setInput(String)
  • Send back output or responses using setOutPut(String)
  • Access the environment state through setState(EnvironmentState)
  • Report task/goal execution result using status(boolean)
  • Query execution status using isSuccess()
Since:
1.0
See Also:

  • EnvironmentState

  • Method Details

    • setInput

      void setInput(String input)
      Sets the input for the agent to process.
      Parameters:
      input - A string containing the input message or instruction from the user or environment.

    • setOutPut

      void setOutPut(String output)
      Sets the output message that the agent wants to communicate back to the user.
      Parameters:
      output - A string containing the agent's response or message to be sent to the user.

    • setState

      void setState(EnvironmentState state)
      Sets the current environment state which the agent can use during processing.
      Parameters:
      state - The current EnvironmentState object.

    • getOut

      String getOut()
      Retrieves the output message generated by the agent.
      Returns:
      The output string that was set via setOutPut(String).

    • status

      void status(boolean isSuccess)
      Updates the status of the last executed operation by the agent.
      Parameters:
      isSuccess - true if the operation succeeded, false otherwise.

    • isSuccess

      boolean isSuccess()
      Returns the status of the last operation executed by the agent.
      Returns:
      true if the last action was successful, false otherwise.
